titleStmt.title: A Reply to the late printed Ansvver given to the letter, directed by protesters to their brethern who are for carrying on of the publick resolutions, and for the authority of the late pretended assemblies.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication, and publisher, suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages 63-64 torn with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
